chess

Class EnPassant

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.EnPassant

  • public class EnPassant
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that implements the special En Passant capturing move by a pawn.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Toni Au

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnPassant()
      A default constructor.
      EnPassant(Piece aPawn)
      A constructor to create a new EnPassant object associated with a pawn that just made a double step move.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece getDoublePushedPawn()
      Get the pawn that just took a double push move
      FileRank getDoublePushedPawnLoc()
      Get the FileRank location of the pawn that just made a double push movement.
      Piece.Colors getEnPassantColor()
      Get the color of the side that can execute an En Passant capture move.
      FileRank getTriggerLoc()
      Get the En Passant trigger location.
      boolean isActive()
      Check if En Passant rule is in effect.
      boolean isEnPassantCompleted()
      Check if the En Passant Rule is over.
      boolean isParticipant(Piece aPawn)
      Check if a given pawn can participate in an En Passant move.
      void setEnPassantCompleted(java.lang.Boolean bFlag)
      All En Passant capture move is only valid for one turn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnPassant

        public EnPassant()
        A default constructor.

      • EnPassant

        public EnPassant(Piece aPawn)
        A constructor to create a new EnPassant object associated with a pawn that just made a double step move.
        Parameters:
        aPawn - A pawn who just made a double step move

    • Method Detail

      • getDoublePushedPawnLoc

        public FileRank getDoublePushedPawnLoc()
        Get the FileRank location of the pawn that just made a double push movement. This is the pawn that is subject to an En Passant capture move by the opponent.
        Returns:
        Return a FileRank location

      • getTriggerLoc

        public FileRank getTriggerLoc()
        Get the En Passant trigger location. This is the empty space behind the pawn that just made a double push move. If the opponent has a pawn right next to the double-pushed pawn, he can move to this empty trigger location and capture the double-pushed pawn.
        Returns:
        Return the En Passant trigger location.

      • getEnPassantColor

        public Piece.Colors getEnPassantColor()
        Get the color of the side that can execute an En Passant capture move. For example, if a white pawn made a double push move, it is the black side that may have an opportunity to execute an En Passant move
        Returns:
        Return a color

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Check if En Passant rule is in effect.
        Returns:
        Return a boolean flag indicating if En Passant rule is in effect.

      • isParticipant

        public boolean isParticipant(Piece aPawn)
        Check if a given pawn can participate in an En Passant move.
        Parameters:
        aPawn - A pawn.
        Returns:
        Return true if the specified pawn can participate in an En Passant capture move.

      • getDoublePushedPawn

        public Piece getDoublePushedPawn()
        Get the pawn that just took a double push move
        Returns:
        A pawn that just made a double push move

      • isEnPassantCompleted

        public boolean isEnPassantCompleted()
        Check if the En Passant Rule is over. En Passant is a one-time only move and must be taken immediately after a pawn made a double push move.
        Returns:
        Return "true" if En Passanst is over. Otherwise, return "false".

      • setEnPassantCompleted

        public void setEnPassantCompleted(java.lang.Boolean bFlag)
        All En Passant capture move is only valid for one turn. Set a flag to indicate that this En Passant move has completed. This move is no longer available at the start of next turn.
        Parameters:
        bFlag - Set a boolean flag
